Method Detail

getAll

public PersistenceMetricsService.Metric[] getAll(int which)
Get all retained metrics. The maximum number retained is currently a constant MAX_METRICS

Specified by:
getAll in interface PersistenceMetricsService
Parameters:
which - one of the constants FULL, DELTA, ALL designating which kind of snapshots should be included.

getAverage

public PersistenceMetricsService.Metric getAverage(int which)
Get the average of all metrics ever generated including the ones that have been dropped due to exceeding MAX_METRICS

Specified by:
getAverage in interface PersistenceMetricsService
Parameters:
which - one of the constants FULL, DELTA, ALL designating which kind of snapshots should be averaged.

getCount

public int getCount(int which)
Description copied from interface: PersistenceMetricsService
Get the count of all persistence snapshots taken (the denominator of the average).

Specified by:
getCount in interface PersistenceMetricsService
Parameters:
which - one of the constants FULL, DELTA, ALL designating which kind of snapshots should be counted.
Returns:
the count of all persistence snapshots taken.
